subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After committing flagrant fouls in Game 5 against the Pacers, Udonis Haslem will have to sit out Miami’s next game and Dexter Pittman will miss the next three.
snippet: After committing flagrant fouls in Game 5 against the Pacers, Udonis Haslem will have to sit out Miami’s next game and Dexter Pittman will miss the next three.
